description: Lower half of the Split Wide layout. The column nears Nykarleby; the landscape opens toward low farmhouses and scattered birch trees. Evening light catches the soldiers’ bayonets and the ruts of the muddy road. Döbeln looks ahead, expression grim but calm, as officers exchange brief words nearby — the march continues without rest.
narration: Toward Nykarleby — night draws near, but duty drives them on.
info: Page 3 – Retreat from Vasa. PageType: Split Wide (2 panels). Scene focus (panel 2): approach to Nykarleby, fatigued soldiers, fading light, Döbeln’s quiet determination.
